review: Time will tell on this one. I love the concept, but the component itself seems glitchy at best. There's a pretty significant lag time between pressing a button on the remote and having the unit respond...sometimes several seconds requiring several clicks of a button. We'll keep using it and see if it grows us on any better. The programming itself is good; has all the channels we regularly watch so worth the money there for sure.

review: We are very happy with the Amazon fire stick! We cut off the cable and just kept our wifi for netflix. We also have hulu. By switching to fire stick we have saved around $40 a month. That really adds up at the end of the year. I do recommend having pretty fast wifi or netflix will lag behind sometimes.
